Question: sy ays ays main wazuha jaiydad ka mksad kya haay؟

fraham krty hay js main URL sy nkalay gaye astfsar kay pyramytrza hawtay hayn۔ yahan aap ayktywytyda raؤt ko astamal krsktay hayn۔ kwiyrprmp praprty: mtalwbha anhasaar draamd kryn: pehlay ، @kwnyy/rwtr sy ayktywytyda rwt klas draamd karna ykyny bnaiyn۔wha jzaw jahan aap astfsar pyramytrza tak rsaiy haasal karna chahti hayn۔ taip askrpt kwpy kwdaympwrt {ayktywyt raؤt} sy '@kwnyy/raؤtr' ؛ sy wabstha astfsar pyramytrza ko bazayaft karnay kay liye ayktywytda raؤt ki astfsar praprt praprty tak rsaiy haasal krsktay hayn۔{// astfsar kay pyramytrza tak rsaiy haasal kryn۔astfsar prymp praprty ayk mshahadha karnay wala hay ، lhazaa aap ko asal astfsar pyramytrza haasal karnay kay l it is ko sbskraib karnay ki zurwrt haay۔ sbskrpshn kay andr ، aap pyram aabjykt par dstyab mkhtlf tarykwn ka astamal karty hoey astfsar pyramytrza tak rsaiy haasal krsktay hayn۔msaal kay tawr par ، pyrams daat ghyt ('pyram nam') 'pyram nam' namy ayk mkhsawsa astfsar pyramytr ki kdr ko bazayaft karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔aap 'pyram nam' ko astfsar pyramytr kay asal nam kay sath tbdyl krsktay hain js tak aap rsaiy haasal karna chahti hayn۔ astfsar pramp kwiyr pyramytrza tak rsaiy kay l get ghyt () ، ghytal () ، aur () jesay tarykay fraham karty hayn۔aap tamam astfsar pyramytr kyza ki ayk saf haasal karnay kay liye klydwn ki praprty ka bhi astamal krsktay hayn۔ yahan ayk aysy msaal hay jo astfsar kay pyramytrza tak rsaiy kay mkhtlf tarykwn ko zaahar krty haay: taip askrpt kwpy kwdaynghwnynt (): batal {kant questeraparams = this.route.queryparammap.subscribe (pyrams => {// ayk wahad astfsar pyramytr wylyw CONT pyramwlyw = pyrams.yt ('pyram nam') ؛ knswl.lwgh (pyramwlyw) tak rsaiy haasal karain ؛ // kesi astfsar pyramytr ki tamam akdar ko srny kramalys = pyrams۔ ghytl ('pyram namha۔') ؛ knswl.lwgh (pyramwalywza) ؛ // chyk karain keh aya koi astfsar pyramytr mwjwd hay kywnpyrams.kys ؛ knswl.lwgh (pyramkyza) ؛}) ؛} astfsar prymp praprty aap ko mwjwdha rastay sy wabstha astfsar pyramytrza kay sath bazayaft aur kam karnay ki ajazat dyty haay۔yha aap kay kwnyy ayply kyshn main astfsar kay pyramytrza tak rsaiy aur hayra phyry ka ayk aasan tarykha fraham krta haay۔

dyghr rastay] ؛ngmodule ({draamdat: [routermodule.forchild (rastay)] ، braamdat: [rwtrmwdawl]}) klas lazaymwdawl braamd karain {{mzakwrha bala msaal main ، lazaymwdawl ayk alyhadha madaywl hay js kay sst/sst.mwdawl')۔ phir (aym (aym=> m.lazymodule)} ، // dusray rastay]@@ngmodule ({draamdat: [routermodule.forroot (rastay)] ، braamdat: [rwtrmwdawl]}) klas sy mtalk klas sy mtalk amwr ki kymt {{las Question: aap sy ays ays ka astamal karty hoey tdryjy ps mnzar kesay bna saktay hayn؟
Answer: kwnyy rwtngh main kynyktyw tychylda antrfys rwt ghardaza ko nafza karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay jo bchwn kay rastwn ki hafazat krsktay hayn۔yha khasa tawr par ayk drjha bndy kay rastay main bchwn kay rastwn ki hafazat kay l multiple mtadd mhaafzawn kay sath mil kar astamal karnay kay liye dayzaain kya gaya haay۔ jab aap kay pas ayk ya zayada bchwn kay rastwn kay sath waldyn ka rastha hawta hay tou ، kynyktywytchlda antrfys aap ko kesi mhaafza ya ghardaza kay ayk syt ki wzuahat karnay ki ajazat dyta haay۔bchwn kay tamam rastwn par laghw hawgha۔as antrfys ka mksad waldyn kay rastay main bchwn kay tamam rastwn ki hafazat kay liye ayk mrkzay mykanzam fraham karna haay۔ yahan keh aap kwnyy rwtngh main ayk sy zayada mhaafzawn kay sath kynyktywytytychylda antrfys ka astamal krsktay hayn: kynyktywytyklda antrfys ko nafza kryn: ayk gharda klas bnaiyn aur is par aml draamd kryn۔kynyktyw tychylda antrfys۔rwtstytysnap shat): kabl mshahadha <bwlyn |urltree> |wadha <bwlyn |urltree> |bwlyn |urltree {// bchwn kay rastwn kay liye gharda mntak drst lwtta haay۔// ya nywyghyshn ko kntrwl karnay kay liye ghalat ya urltree waps kryn}}}}}}}.as tarykha kar ko rwtr nay is bat ka tayn karnay kay liye blaya hay keh aya bchwn kay rastwn ko chalw kya jana chahaiay ya nhayn۔ rwtngh madaywl main gharda ki tshkyl kryn: rwtngh madaywl main jahan aap waldyn kay rastay ki wzuahat karty hain js main bchwn kay rastay hawtay hain ، gharda ko trtyb dynwaldyn kay rastay ki kynyktywytychylda praprty۔ taip askrpt kwpy kwdakwnst rwts: rastay = [{rastha: 'waldyn' ، jzaw: pyrnt kmpwynty ، kynyktywytychylda: [maiy gharda] ، bchay: [// bchwn kay rastay]}] above mzakwrha bala msaal main ، maiy gharda hay ، maiy gharda aai ays haaywaldyn kay rastay ki kynyktyw tychylda praprty main shaml kya ghya۔as sy yeh ykyny bnta hay keh maiy gharda kay zaryaha byan krdha ghardaza ka atalak 'waldyn' kay rwt kay that bchwn kay tamam rastwn par kya jaye gha۔ aap kynyktywtyklda praprty ko mhaafzawn ki ayk saf fraham krkay mtadd mhaafzawn ki bhi wzuahat krsktay hayn۔ghardaza ko is trtyb main phansy di jaye gi js ki woh fharst main hayn۔ taip askrpt kwpy kwdaykanyktywytytychlda: [my gharda 1 ، maiy gharda 2 ، maiy gharda 3] ، mzakwrha bala msaal main ، maiy gharda 1 ، maiy gharda 2 ، aur maiy gharda 3 tyn alag alag mhaafza hain jo bchay ki hafazat kay liye astamal kyay jien ghay۔rwts۔ kay zaryaha kynyktyw tychylda antrfys ka astamal karty hoey ، aap aysay mhaafzawn ki wzuahat krsktay hain jo khasa tawr par waldyn kay rastay main bchwn kay rastwn ki hafazat kay liye dayzaain kyay gaye hayn۔as sy aap ko pychydha ajazat ya twsayk ki mntak ko nafza karnay ki ajazat mlty hay jo bchwn kay rastwn kay ayk ghrwp par laghw hawta hay ، is bat ko ykyny bnata hay keh un tak rsaiy sy kbl un ki krsktay hayn۔mtalwbha anhasaar: sab sy pehlay ، rwtr klas ko @kwnyy/rwtr sy jzaw ya khdmt main draamd karna ykyny bnaiyn jahan aap raؤtr۔ nywyghyt baiwrl () tarykha۔ taip askrpt kwpy kwdaympwrt { karnay wala aapshn drst haay۔as sy yeh ykyny bnta hay keh mwjwdha yw aar ayl ko braؤzar ki tarykh main niay yw aar ayl kay sath tbdyl kya gaya haay۔aghr saarf braؤzar main byk btn par klyk krta hay tou ، nywyghyshn hony sy pehlay woh pchhlay yw aar ayl main waps nahin jaskyn ghay۔ agar tbdyl karain yw aar ayl fraham nahin kya jata hay ya ghalat par syt nahin kya jata hay tou ، nya yw aar ayl tarykh kay astyk main shaml kya jaye ga ، awrsaarf byk btn par klk krkay pchhlay yw aar ayl main waps ja sakta haay۔ nwt karain keh raؤtr daat nywyghyt baiwrl () tarykha nywyghyshn kay liye dusray hayn۔ raؤtr.nwyghyt baiwrl () kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey ، tbdyl karain ، aap braؤzar ki tarykh main mwjwdha yw aar ayl ki jghha la kar ayk niay yw aar ayl main tshryf la jasktay hayn۔، saarf kay liye baghair kesi nywyghyshn ka tjrbha fraham krna۔

Question: sy ays ays main mtalk aur rshtha dar pwzayshnngh main kya frk haay؟
Answer: kwnyy rwtngh main ، ayktywytyt rwt۔ dayta praprty aap ko kesi rastay sy wabstha dayta tak rsaiy haasal karnay ki ajazat dyty haay۔yha kstm dayta ko kesi rastay par mntkl karnay aur is dayta ko mzakwrha bala msaal main ، dayta praprty ko 'msaal' kay rastay main shaml kya jata haay۔as main kstm dayta shaml hay jesay rwt sy wabstha anwan aur tfsayl۔ jzaw main mwjwd aadad wa shmar ki rsaiy: chalw rwt kay mtaabk jzaw main ، aap ayktywytyt rwt.dayta praprty ka astamal karty hoey dayta tak rsaiy haasal krsktay hayn۔kwnyy/kwr '؛ ampwrt {ayktywyt rwt} say'@kwnyy/rwtr '؛@jzaw ({// jzaw ki tshkyl}) aykspwrt klas msaal kay tawr par {knstrktr (njy rwt: ayktywytda rwt) {} ngoninit () {this.route.data.sbskraib karain (dayta => {kwnt taitl = dayta۔ taitl ؛ kanst dastry = dayta.ayskrpshn ؛ // zurwrt kay mtaabk dayta ka astamal kryn}) ؛}} mzakwrha bala msaal main ، ayktywyt rwt ko jzaw kay knstrktr main anjkshn lghaya jata haay۔ngoninit () kay tarykha kar main ، aap ayktywytyt raؤt.dayta praprty ko sbskraib krsktay hain aur rwt sy wabstha kstm dayta tak rsaiy haasal krsktay hayn۔sbskrpshn kay andr ، aap mkhsawsa dayta praprtyza nkal saktay hain aur apnay jzaw main zurwrt kay mtaabk un
